author: ETMarkets.com
title: View: Time to reset agenda in India's market reforms
description: According to Matthews, India’s real economic problem remains its financial system.
content:
NEW DELHI: Mark Matthews of Julius Baer on Thursday termed India's ongoing lockdown measures to contain the coronavirus outbreak as “draconian”, but said it would be a worthwhile investment if these measures succeed.
He said the shutdown could be a catalyst … [+1498 chars]
